title: Angel food
creator_credit: Victorian College of the Arts, Robert Stephenson, Anne Shenfield, Paul Fletcher and Julia Bourke
brief_description: Animated film that charts the short-lived adventures of an intrepid strawberry as it evades a variety of kitchen hazards - including vicious utensils, distraction by a Busby Berkeley-style fruit mambo, and a seductive but ultimately deadly pot of melted chocolate - to fulfill its quest to sit atop a decadent whipped cream and meringue dessert. “A glossy tale with a sticky end.”
